title: What about the workers
creator_credit: Rank Organisation Film Productions and A Mithras Production
brief_description: Prints, photographs, and contemporary news reels are used to give an outline of the social history of British industry, in particular of trade unions between 1880-1919 and 1920-1945 Music by Carl Davis.
